title: >>> Just "ASK"!
body_text:
Just "ASK" what? Oh, you're confused?
..........
When you think of the classic "ten" events, several words or even images might come to mind. Music, awards, decorations, lights, among others make these timeless events that much more special. This time around, it's only appropriate to "try" something new. Add another word onto that list.
At DODGEBALL 50,
food
will be ordered! As great as that may sound already, it will also be served throughout the
entire
event! Now of course don't expect the biggest of dishes or trays. But some nice goodies are prepared much to the delight of everyone in attendance.
So on behalf of everyone associated with dodgeball, we say "thank you" to
A.S.K. FoodInc
.
..........
Get it now? Good.
Quick Rundown thus far:
> The First-ever "2 vs. 2" Captains Battle featuring Champion Kevin Adams and three mystery participants!
> A.S.K. FoodInc. catering at DODGEBALL 50!
body_html:
Just "ASK" what? Oh, you're confused?

..........

When you think of the classic "ten" events, several words or even images might come to mind. Music, awards, decorations, lights, among others make these timeless events that much more special. This time around, it's only appropriate to "try" something new. Add another word onto that list.

At DODGEBALL 50, food will be ordered! As great as that may sound already, it will also be served throughout the entire event! Now of course don't expect the biggest of dishes or trays. But some nice goodies are prepared much to the delight of everyone in attendance.

So on behalf of everyone associated with dodgeball, we say "thank you" to A.S.K. FoodInc.

..........

Get it now? Good.


Quick Rundown thus far:
> The First-ever "2 vs. 2" Captains Battle featuring Champion Kevin Adams and three mystery participants!
> A.S.K. FoodInc. catering at DODGEBALL 50!
